## Checklist

- [ ] Uses Proxies.sx mobile proxies (`/v1/x402/proxy` or existing port)
- [ ] Gated with x402 USDC payments (returns 402 without payment)
- [ ] Working and deployed at a reachable endpoint
- [ ] Returns structured data (JSON)
